TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintCapabilities extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義印表機的功能。

span.span: Defines the capabilities of a printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是特定類型的 XML 文件稱為 「 簡單-至--運用表示法*PrintCapabilities 文件*。A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintCapabilities document*. 後者是所有印表機的功能，以及其目前設定的快照集。The latter is a snapshot of all of a printer's capabilities and their current settings. 例如，如果印表機支援彩色列印，則文件會有``之色彩的輸出將會如何處理的項目。For example, if the printer supports color printing, then the document would have a `` element that sets out how color output will be handled. 項目，接著由屬性物件。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. 如果印表機不支援的色彩，則沒有任何``文件和 windows 7 中的項目屬性是`null`。If the printer does not support color, then there is no `` element in the document and the value of the property is `null`. PrintCapabilities 文件必須符合[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintCapabilities document must conform to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 類別可讓您的應用程式，以取得印表機的功能，而不需要進行任何直接讀取 XML 的物件。The class enables your application to obtain a printer's capabilities without having to engage in any direct reading of XML objects. 所有的檔案和相片的印表機，如 「 住家 」 和 「 商務最受歡迎的功能由封裝類別。All of the most popular features of file and photo printers, for both home and business, are encapsulated by the class. 但是[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定義更多，較不常見，功能也可以擴充以處理特殊的列印裝置的功能。But the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此，雖然並類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. **附註**時具有會接受 PrintCapabilities 文件的建構函式建立物件 (為) 參數，該整份文件會儲存在非公用欄位中的物件，包括其內的 XML 項目表示未表示的任何公用屬性的較不常見功能類別。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintCapabilities document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事實上，如果產生 PrintCapabilities 文件的驅動程式正在使用的私用擴充功能[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 也非公開定義標記也會儲存為非公用 PrintCapabilities 文件的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintCapabilities document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintCapabilities document. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援使用 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別內其中一個應用程式類型可能會產生非預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要列印 Windows Form 應用程式，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷特定印表機的功能以及如何設定來運用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream xmlStream) cil managed

param.name: xmlStream
param.span: XML ，描述印表機功能且符合列印結構描述。

span.span: An XML that describes printer capabilities and conforms to the Print Schema.

summary.span: 使用指定印表機功能並符合 XML [列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 資料流 (包含 PrintCapabilities 文件)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintCapabilities document) that specifies printer capabilities and complies with the XML [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整個 PrintCapabilities 文件會儲存在非公用欄位中的物件，包括 express 未表示的任何公用屬性的較不常見功能的 XML 項目內類別。The entire PrintCapabilities document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事實上，如果產生 PrintCapabilities 文件的驅動程式正在使用的私用擴充功能[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 也非公開定義標記也會儲存為非公用 PrintCapabilities 文件的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintCapabilities document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintCapabilities document. 私用組件的文件中，如果有的話，不會驗證建構函式，但全部**列印結構描述**-已定義的組件會進行驗證，包括未表示的任何公用屬性的部分類別。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 因此，可能擲回，即使所有對應於的公用屬性的 XML 標記無效。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid.

span.span: is .
is not valid XML.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollationCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Collation)

summary.span: 取得或設定值集合，指出印表機是否能將輸出自動分頁。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the collation capabilities of a printer.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準印表機通常會將輸出的每一頁的第一個複本，則第二個複本，並依此類推的每一頁列印自動分頁。A standard printer typically collates output by printing every page of the first copy, then every page of the second copy, and so on. 當標準印表機沒有自動分頁時，它會列印第一頁中，每個複本，則每一份第二個頁面上，並依此類推。When a standard printer does not collate, it prints every copy of the first page, then every copy of the second page, and so on. 有些印表機是特別配備有 「 bin 定序。這些特定配備的印表機的列印順序可能不同於標準的印表機，不過結果都相同： 多個分頁的列印工作的每一份包含其所有依照正確順序排列的頁面，而不手動排序。Some printers are specially equipped with collating bins. The printing sequence for these specially equipped printers may differ from those of standard printers; however the outcome is the same: each copy of a multi-paged print job contains all its pages in the proper sequence without manual sorting. 如果印表機不支援定序，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support collation, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate`關鍵字，不`JobCollateAllDocuments`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來判斷特定印表機的功能以及如何設定來運用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of DeviceFontSubstitution)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值可識別印表機是否會將以裝置內建的字型替換為電腦中的字型，以及其替換方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify whether and how a printer can substitute device-based fonts for computer-based fonts.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援裝置字型替換，集合是空的。If the printer does not support device font substitution, the collection is empty. 如果它確實支援字型替換，驅動程式應該同時包含和集合中的值。If it does support font substitution, the driver should include both the and values in the collection. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DuplexingCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Duplexing)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值可識別印表機是否執行雙面列印，以及其執行方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify whether and how a printer can perform two-sided printing.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援雙面列印，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support duplexing, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously`關鍵字，不`DocumentDuplex`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來判斷特定印表機的功能以及如何設定來運用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputBinCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of InputBin)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值表示要使用哪個輸入紙匣。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate what input bin (paper tray) is used.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`，如果裝置所支援功能，; 否則它代表`DocumentInputBin`的話，支援此功能; 否則它代表`PageInputBin`。This property represents the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s feature `JobInputBin`, if that feature is supported by the device; otherwise, it represents `DocumentInputBin`, if that feature is supported; otherwise, it represents `PageInputBin`. 如果印表機不支援任何一項功能，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support any of these features, the collection is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaxCopyCount As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> MaxCopyCount { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示印表機在單一列印工作中可以包含的最大複本數目。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the maximum number of copies that the device can print in a single print job.

value.span: 可為 null 的 值，這個值指定印表機可以列印的最大複本數目。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies the maximum number of copies that a printer can print.

value.span: 如果裝置驅動程式未報告最大數目，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the device driver does not report a maximum.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments`關鍵字，不`DocumentCopiesAllPages`關鍵字，或`PageCopies`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 如果印表機可以列印無限制的複本，則屬性值會是 9999。If the printer can print unlimited copies, the property value is 9999.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrientedPageMediaHeight As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> OrientedPageMediaHeight { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示頁面上可做為影像之區域的高度，而高度是指相對於頁面方向的垂直維度。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the height of the imageable area on a page, where height means the vertical dimension relative to the page's orientation.

value.span: 可為 null 的 值，這個值表示印表機可以在頁面上列印的區域高度 (單位為像素，每次可增加 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A nullable value indicating the height, in pixels, which are 1/96 inch increments, of the area on a page that the printer is capable of printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多數印表機必須保留的頁面，即可防止碳粉取得的部分印表機，移動工作表上邊緣的未列印的區域。Most printers must leave an unprinted area along the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 此屬性會對應至**ImageableSizeHeight**屬性[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageImageableSize`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the **ImageableSizeHeight** property of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageImageableSize` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrientedPageMediaWidth As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> OrientedPageMediaWidth { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示頁面上可做為影像之區域的寬度，而寬度是指相對於頁面方向的水平維度。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the width of the imageable area on a page, where width means the horizontal dimension relative to the page's orientation.

value.span: 可為 null 的 值，這個值表示印表機可以在頁面上列印的區域寬度 (單位為像素，每次可增加 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A nullable value indicating the width, in pixels, which are 1/96 inch increments, of the area on a page that the printer is capable of printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多數印表機必須保留的頁面，即可防止碳粉取得的部分印表機，移動工作表上邊緣的未列印的區域。Most printers must leave an unprinted area along the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 此屬性會對應至`ImageableSizeWidth`的屬性[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageImageableSize`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the `ImageableSizeWidth` property of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageImageableSize` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputColorCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of OutputColor)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值指定印表機可以彩色和灰階列印內容的方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that specify the ways in which a printer can print content with color and shades of gray.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援輸出色彩選項，集合是空的。If the printer does not support output color options, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputColor`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputColor` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputQualityCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of OutputQuality)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值表示印表機支援的輸出品質類型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate the types of output quality the printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，列舉型別具有值， ，和品質，其他項目。For example, the enumeration has values for , , and quality, among others. 如果印表機不支援輸出品質的選取項目，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support output quality selection, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputQuality`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputQuality` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageBorderlessCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageBorderless)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值表示印表機是否可以在媒體的邊緣上列印。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate whether the printer can print up to the edge of the media.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的雷射和噴墨印表機不支援無邊列印。Most laser and inkjet printers do not support borderless printing. 它們必須允許未列印的邊界，以防止碳粉移動紙張的印表機的組件上取得。They must allow an unprinted margin to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the paper. 不過，大部分的相片印表機，並支援無邊列印。Many photographic printers, however, do support borderless printing. 如果印表機不支援無框線列印，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support borderless printing, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageBorderless`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageBorderless` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageImageableArea As PageImageableArea
public: property System::Printing::PageImageableArea ^ PageImageableArea { System::Printing::PageImageableArea ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得物件，這個物件表示印表機可以使用的頁面區域。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the area of a page that the printer can use.

value.span: 物件，指定可做為影像之區域左上角的距離 (以像素為單位，每像素為 1/96 英吋)。

span.span: A object that specifies the distance, in pixels (units of 1/96 inch), of the upper-left corner of the imageable area.

value.span: 垂直距離是從頁面上邊緣開始測量，而水平距離則是從左邊緣開始測量。

span.span: The vertical distance is measured from the top edge of the paper and the horizontal distance is measured from the left edge.

value.span: 傳回值也會指定可做為影像之區域的寬度和高度。

span.span: The return value also specifies the width and height of the imageable area.

value.span: 如果印表機驅動程式沒有報告可做為影像的區域，則這個屬性為 null。

span.span: If the printer driver does not report an imageable area, then this property is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的雷射和噴墨印表機都必須允許未列印的頁面，即可防止碳粉取得的部分印表機，移動工作表上邊緣的邊界。Most laser and inkjet printers must allow an unprinted margin around the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 不過，大部分的相片印表機，可以使用整個頁面列印影像。Many photographic printers, however, can use the entire page to print an image.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageMediaSizeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageMediaSize)

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這個物件識別印表機所支援的紙張和媒體大小。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that identify the paper and media sizes that a printer supports.
A of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageMediaTypeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageMediaType)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值識別印表機支援的紙張和其他媒體類型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what types of paper and other media a printer supports.

value.span: 值的 可指定列印媒體，例如卡片、標籤、普通紙或相片紙。

span.span: A of values specifying the print media, such as card stock, label, plain, or photographic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援的媒體類型選取項目，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support media type selection, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageMediaType`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageMediaType` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageOrderCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageOrder)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值指出印表機是否能夠以由前到後、由後到前或兩者併用的方法來列印多頁文件。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate whether a printer is capable of printing multiple-page documents from front-to-back, back-to-front, or both ways.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援頁面順序選取項目，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support page order selection, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobPageOrder`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobPageOrder` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageOrientationCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageOrientation)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值識別印表機支援的頁面方向類型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what types of page orientation a printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援頁面方向選取項目，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support page orientation selection, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOrientation`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOrientation` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageResolutionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageResolution)

summary.span: 取得 物件集合，這個值識別印表機支援的頁面解析度層次。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that identify what levels of page resolution the printer supports.
A of objects.

value.span: 每個值都會以質化值、Dot-Per Inch (DPI) 值或兩者併用的方式來表示頁面解析度。

span.span: Each value represents a page resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageScalingFactorRange As PageScalingFactorRange
public: property System::Printing::PageScalingFactorRange ^ PageScalingFactorRange { System::Printing::PageScalingFactorRange ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得最大和最小百分比，使印表機可以據此放大或縮小頁面上的列印影像。

span.span: Gets the maximum and minimum percentages by which a printer can enlarge or reduce the print image on a page.

value.span: 具有 和 屬性的 物件，這個物件含有表示百分比的 值。

span.span: A object with and properties holding values that represent percentages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這屬性通常代表[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`關鍵字。This property generally represents the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有一些複雜度的如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. - 如果 PrintCapabilities 文件並沒有`PageScaling`項目，或它有一個項目，但沒有其**CustomSquare**也**自訂**選項定義; 則屬性為 null。If the PrintCapabilities document does not have a `PageScaling` element, or it has one, but neither its **CustomSquare** nor **Custom** options are defined; then the property is null. - 在其他情況下，屬性的行為如下所示。In all other cases, the property's behavior is as follows. 的屬性屬性的物件是下列值的最小值。The property of the property's object is the smallest of the following values. - **MinValue**屬性`PageScalingScaleWidth`提供的值的資料類型**自訂**選項的**ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleWidth` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`. - **MinValue**屬性`PageScalingScaleHeight`提供的值的資料類型**自訂**選項的**ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleHeight` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`. - **MinValue**屬性`PageScalingScale`提供的值的資料類型**CustomSquare**選項的**擴展** `ScoredProperty`。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScale` datatype that provides the value of the **CustomSquare** option's **Scale** `ScoredProperty`. 的屬性屬性的物件是下列值的最大值。The property of the property's object is the largest of the following values. - **MaxValue**屬性`PageScalingScaleWidth`提供的值的資料類型**自訂**選項的**ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleWidth` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`. - **MaxValue**屬性`PageScalingScaleHeight`提供的值的資料類型**自訂**選項的**ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleHeight` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option's **ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`. - **MaxValue**屬性`PageScalingScale`提供的值的資料類型**CustomSquare**選項的**擴展** `ScoredProperty`。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScale` datatype that provides the value of the **CustomSquare** option's **Scale** `ScoredProperty`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PagesPerSheetCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Integer)

summary.span: 取得整數集合，其中的每個值識別使用者可以選擇在紙張單面上列印的頁面數目。

span.span: Gets a collection of integers, each identifying the number of pages that a user can choose to print on a single side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 值的 表示印表機支援在單面上列印一頁以上的選項。

span.span: A of values representing the options that a printer supports for printing more than one page per side.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的印表機支援有限的數目的特定選項，例如 1、 2、 4、 6、 9、 和 16 個側邊頁面。Most printers support only a limited number of specific options, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, and 16 pages per side. 如果印表機不支援每張紙包含的多個頁面，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support multiple pages per sheet, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至`PagesPerSheet ScoredProperty`的[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`關鍵字不`DocumentNUp`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the `PagesPerSheet ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PagesPerSheetDirection)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值識別印表機支援用來表示在紙張單面上列印多頁的模式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what patterns a printer supports for presenting multiple pages on a single side of a sheet of paper.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比方說，某些印表機可以呈現頁面左到右資料列與資料列堆疊上到。For example, some printers can present pages in left-to-right rows with the rows stacked top-to-bottom. 另一個模式，其中某些印表機支援，是由右至左資料列與資料列堆疊下至上。Another pattern, which some printers support, is right-to-left rows with the rows stacked bottom-to-top. 如果印表機不支援每張紙包含的多個頁面，這個集合是空的。If the printer does not support multiple pages per sheet, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至`PresentationDirection`的 subfeature[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`關鍵字不`DocumentNUp`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the `PresentationDirection` subfeature of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PhotoPrintingIntentCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PhotoPrintingIntent)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值識別印表機支援的相片列印品質選項。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the quality options the printer supports for printing photographs.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援的相片品質的選項，集合是空的。If the printer does not support options for photographic quality, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaplingCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Stapling)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值識別印表機支援的自動裝訂類型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the types of automatic stapling that a printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援裝訂，集合是空的。If the printer does not support stapling, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments`關鍵字，不`DocumentStaple`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來判斷特定印表機的功能以及如何設定來運用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TrueTypeFontModeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of TrueTypeFontMode)

summary.span: 取得值集合，這個值識別印表機支援的 TrueType 字型處理方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the methods that a printer supports for handling TrueType fonts.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果印表機不支援的任何方法的特殊處理 TrueType 字型，集合是空的。If the printer does not support any method of special handling for TrueType fonts, the collection is empty. 此屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageTrueTypeFontMode`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword.
